product_name: Black Diamond First Strike Junior Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Black Diamond First Strike Junior trekking poles combine double FlickLock adjustability, comfortable foam grips and great value in an easy-to-use size that's perfect for kids and short adults. 2-section poles provide patented FlickLock adjustability with "zero-slip" security. Simply flick the lock open, set the length and flick the lock closed-a quick, tight, and easily accomplished task, even with gloves on your hands. Soft rubber grips are sized for small hands and have adjustable nylon wrist straps. Poles extend from 26 to 43 in. Black Diamond First Strike Junior trekking poles include steel safety tips, low-profile baskets and winter baskets for year-round use.
short_description: The Black Diamond First Strike Junior trekking poles combine double FlickLock adjustability, comfortable foam grips and great value in an easy-to-use size that's perfect for kids and short adults.
